text: Benoît M.A.J. Lutgen (born March 10, 1970 in Bastogne) is a Belgian politician of the Centre démocrate humaniste (cdH). Lutgen has been party chair since 2011 and also mayor of his home town since 2012. Previously he was a minister in the Walloon government. title: Benoît Lutgen
